name: Let's go
description:
This is a casual game with a very simple gameplay mode. Players need to control the color scheme to embark on jumping adventures, accurately control the distance of the jump, and do not use too much or too little force, otherwise the challenge will fail!
Jump and jump, jump onto the block. The farther you jump, the higher the score. The smaller the block, the higher the score. Do you want to know how far you can jump? Give it a try!
Gameplay instructions
1. Press the left mouse button to accumulate energy.
2. Release the left mouse button to jump.
3. When you fall, the game will restart!
Game Features
The game operation is simple, and players only need to press and release to complete the game operation.
1. Challenges that test speed and responsiveness
2. Easy to learn, difficult to master
3. Simple and unique gameplay
